name: Apex Mage (v. 1.0.0)
description:
GOAL:

To battle in multiple encounters, gaining enough power to take on the Grand Wizard in order to become the Apex Mage and ascend to a Wizard.

HOW TO PLAY:

Overworld: use Arrow keys or WASD to move around the world

Open the drop down menu by clicking the menu button on the top left of the screen, can save the game, return to the menu or exit the game

Battle: The game operates on a turn-based system.  On your turn, click any of the 4 ability buttons to either cast an attack to your opponent or heal yourself.  

Defeating an enemy by taking their health down to 0 will increase your level.

On level increase, you'll either gain more HP or learn a new Ability but replacing one existing ability. (Refer to the Progression bar in the Overworld)
